```{r Cleaning}
NY$mgrent <- gsub("[^0-9]", "", NY$mgrent)
NY$mgrent <- as.numeric(NY$mgrent)

NY$npr <- gsub("[^0-9]", "", NY$npr)
NY$npr <-as.numeric(NY$npr)

agg_NY <- aggregate(NY[,56:58], by = list(NY$year, NY$sba), FUN = mean, na.rm = TRUE)
colnames(agg_NY) <- c("Year", "Sub-Borough","Avg_NPR", "Avg_Rent", "Avg_Income")
```
